title: Financial Situation Changed Due to COVID? Professional Advice Can Help - Kiplinger's Personal Finance
content: Financial Situation Changed Due to COVID? Professional Advice Can Help  Kiplinger's Personal Finance
description: The pandemic’s effects can be felt in many ways, some bad (you lost your job or were forced into retirement), some good (your savings grew fat while you were stuck at home). Maybe you put off marriage or buying a home. If you aren’t sure how to move forward, get help.
